sentences.en: A bond is a promissory note, usually issued for a specified amount.
sentences.cn: 债券是一种期票, 通常以一定数额发行.

sentences.en: After a specified delay, bit " o " is read again.
sentences.cn: 经过一定的延迟后, 再次读 “ O ” 位.

sentences.en: After you have specified which operation of one interface corresponds to which operation of another interface, you need to map the operation parameters.
sentences.cn: 在指定一个接口的哪个操作对应于另一个接口的哪个操作以后，您需要映射操作参数。

sentences.en: At this point we have fully specified our service.
sentences.cn: 至此，我们已经完成了服务的全部指定。

sentences.en: Each point on Earth is specified by geographic latitude and longitude.
sentences.cn: 地球上每一点都可以用地理纬度和经度来确定.

sentences.en: Ecodeme refers to a deme occuring within a specified kind of habitat.
sentences.cn: 生态同群种是指出现于某种特殊生境内的同群种.

sentences.en: He specified the reasons for the failure.
In the case of two blade chassis, each node group should be specified on each blade.
sentences.cn: 在存在两个刀片机箱的情况下，每个刀片上都应指定每个节点组。

sentences.en: It is generated by some specified means.
sentences.cn: 这是由某些未加说明的方法产生的.

sentences.en: Physical properties that are completely specified by their magnitude are called scalars.
sentences.cn: 物理性质完全由其大小所确定者叫做标量.

sentences.en: Referring to my conversation with you today, I now enclose an order sheet for hosiery as specified.
sentences.cn: 参照今日和你方的谈判记录, 兹随函寄上详细叙述订购卫生衣的订单2份,请查收.

sentences.en: The amount of the fine must be specified.
sentences.cn: 罚款之金额必须明文规定.

sentences.en: The architect specified oak for the wood trim.
sentences.cn: 那位建筑师指定用橡木做木饰条.

sentences.en: The bar directions are conveniently specified by direction cosines.
sentences.cn: 杆的方向通常用方向余弦来表示.

sentences.en: The base chosen should be specified.
The protective equipment specified on the label should be worn.
sentences.cn: 都应穿戴着标签上所指定的防护装备.

sentences.en: Tickets must be bought seven days in advance, with outward and return journey dates specified.
sentences.cn: 购票需提前7天，并确定往返日期。

sentences.en: When boiling points are reported, the pressure must be specified.
sentences.cn: 在报导沸点时, 必须说明压力.

words.tran_cn: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的
[计] 说明符；指示语；[计] 区分符
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书
指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 除另有规定外；除非另有说明

trans.tran_cn: 指定( specify的过去式和过去分词 )，详述，提出…的条件，使具有特性
